objects.text:
• Rotatable Spout Design
• Premium Stainless Steel
• Space-Saving Design
• Ergonomic Divider Layout

Cisily Black Sponge Holder
Rustproof 304 Stainless Steel
Perfect for Brushes, Sponges & Soap

product_details.description: Stainless Steel 【ROTATABLE SPOUT】This kitchen sink caddy comes with a rotatable spout that swivels in three directions so that the water in the sponge can be directed to the sink. There won't be any water left on the countertop, you don't need to pull out the drip tray to clean it often, saving your cleaning time. 【SMALL VOLUME】 Cisily sponge holder is suitable for kitchens with limited space. It measures only 9.25"*3.97"*6.37", Holds a detergent bottle, a sponge ball and sink stopper. With an extra upgraded brush holder that can hold up to 4 small and large sized brushes, with the Cisily Sink caddy you can save countertop space perfectly. 【PREMIUM STURDY MATERIAL】 Cisily kitchen sink organizer is made of premium stainless steel which can effectively prevent rust and deformation. And you can clean it easily by rinsing it under a running tap. Take the clutter out of your countertops. 【REASONABLE DIVIDER DESIGN】 The sponge holder for kitchen sink ergonomic divider design allows it to have 3 separate storage spaces, Different items are placed in different areas. Make the most of every inch of space and make your kitchen look cleaner. 【SATISFACTION GUARANTEED】The CISILY kitchen sink organizer is ready to use upon receipt, no installation required and is widely used on counters or bathrooms, making it a satisfying gift. If you have any questions during use, please consult our customer service staff. We want to provide you with a pleasant shopping experience. USPTO patent：USD1045310S Color - Black ** Material - Black ** Product Dimensions - 9.25"L x 3.93"W x 6.3"H ** Item Weight - 100 Grams ** Brand - Cisily **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sleek and modern layout for promoting a kitchen organizer product. The composition features a clean, light gradient background (`background`) with soft circular and linear abstract elements for depth. A bold, uppercase title (`heading`) draws immediate attention to the product type, followed by a concise subtitle (`subheading`) for context. A bullet-point list (`features`) effectively highlights product benefits in a clear layout. The price (`price`) is large and eye-catching to emphasize value. Below is a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with prominent white text (`cta`) on a solid dark background. The product image (`product_image`) is placed on the right, clearly presenting the item. A short descriptive text block (`description`) supports the offering with relevant product details.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#2C3E50` – used for text, button, and accents
- Soft Gray: `#f5f5f5` to `#e8e8e8` – background gradient
- Accent Gray-Blue: `#34495E` – for body text
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF` – for button label and highlights
product_color: The product image showcases a modern, sleek sink organizer with a minimalist color palette that balances industrial and natural elements. Dominant colors include matte black for the metal caddy (#1C1C1C), natural light wood for the brush handles (#D8B184), and soft white for the brush heads (#F7F7F7). Accents of vivid yellow (#FFE600) and green (#157A4D) from the sponge, and translucent sage green from the soap bottle (#A8C1A1) add vibrancy. The metallic silver of the faucet (#B0B0B0) enhances the contemporary feel. The contrasting hues are clearly defined yet harmoniously blended, offering clean visual segmentation, making this palette ideal for a fresh, organized product ad.
